thread.title: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board
thread.title_full: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board

title: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board
text: > Pennsylvania Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board FILE - In this Dec. 6, 2014 file photo, Tamron Hall arrives at Selma And The Legends That Paved The Way Gala in Goleta, Calif. Temple University trustees are expected to vote next week on naming NBC correspondent Tamron Hall to fill a seat on the board vacated by Bill Cosby last year. Cosby resigned from the board in December following renewed allegations that he drugged and sexually assaulted women over many years. (Photo by Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP, File)
